Actions.Name: Decrypt data with key
Actions.Description: Decrypt data using the latest version of a key. Output of this operation is typically classified as secret and can be visible in the run history.

Actions.Name: Decrypt data with key version
Actions.Description: Decrypt data using a specific version of a key. Output of this operation is typically classified as secret and can be visible in the run history.

Actions.Name: Encrypt data with key
Actions.Description: Encrypt data using the latest version of a key.

Actions.Name: Encrypt data with key version
Actions.Description: Encrypt data using a specific version of a key.

Actions.Name: Get key version metadata
Actions.Description: Gets metadata of a version of a key.

Actions.Name: Get secret
Actions.Description: Gets a secret. Output of this operation is typically classified as secret and can be visible in the run history.

Actions.Name: Get secret version
Actions.Description: Gets a version of a secret. Output of this operation is typically classified as secret and can be visible in the run history.

Actions.Name: Get secret version metadata
Actions.Description: Gets metadata of a version of a secret.
